GeneDef.label: major tox resistance
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are resistant to toxic buildup from any source. This includes pollution, toxic fallout, tox gas, and direct attacks with venom or injected poison. They'll gain one quarter the amount of toxic buildup compared to others.\n\nCellular filters in the lung and skin reduce the dose of toxins entering the bloodstream.
